properties.notes: Construction of 3-storey building to form 9 flats with associated parking, refuse/cycle stores and landscaping, following demolition of existing buildings.

properties.site-address: LAND ADJ TO CATHERINE HOUSE, STANHOPE ROAD
properties.notes: Mixed-use development comprising the construction of: 16-storey building to provide 147 dwellings and associated facilities (Class C3); 19-storey building to provide 222-bed hotel (Class C1), offices (Class B1a), events space (Class B1a/Class D2), 'sky bar' (Class A3/A4), restaurant/bar (Class A3/A4), and ground floor caf�/restaurants (Class A3) totalling 16,344sqm (GEA) of non-residential floorspace; basement parking and plant areas with access from Stanhope Road; associated facilities and landscaping works to Commercial Road, Stanhope Road and entrances to Victoria Park.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.notes: Construction of three-storey rear extension and additional storey to existing roof to form 6 additional flats
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.notes: Conversion of former Police Station (Sui Generis) to form 18 self-contained dwellings (Class C3) with associated cycle and refuse storage; and external alterations to include installation of windows to north elevation (ground floor).
